welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Atherstone, the charming town known for its picturesque streets and rich history. We invite you to explore its beauty and immerse yourself in its unique culture. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Birmingham Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Birmingham Airport primarily serves low-cost airlines.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Birmingham Airport serves primarily international flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, with free access for up to 4 hours.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at West Midlands International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at West Midlands International Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at East Midlands Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at East Midlands Airport, primarily used for low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
